summary: influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 circulated in west africa later than in other regions of the continent. results Of the 11 countries contacted, 8 responded: Burkina Faso, Cote d’Ivoire, Mali, Mauritania, Niger, Nigeria, Sierra Leone and Togo. more data on risk groups for severe influenza in west africa are needed to shape influenza prevention and clinical management policies and guidelines. more data on risk groups for severe influenza in west africa are needed to shape influenza prevention and clinical management policies and guidelines.
